data.actual_result: the emoji picker overlaps the popup
data.expected_result: the emoji picker should close just like it does when not using the shortcut
data.short_description: the "too many reactions" pop-up doesn't close the emoji picker when holding shift to add reactions
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the reaction button to open the emoji picker - hold shift and add add reactions till the "too many reactions" popup appears - observe
